Package com.bluegosling.reflect

Utilities to aid in runtime type reflection code, including the use of proxies.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Converter<I,O>
    Converts a value from one form to another, possibly with the aid of a Caster.
    EnumType.EnumElement<T>
    Represents a single element in an enumeration.
    TypeAnnotationChecker
    Checks if a given set of type annotations is assignable to another set.
    TypeVisitor<R,P>
    A visitor for generic types.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotatedTypeRef<T>  
    AnnotatedTypes
    Numerous utility methods for using, constructing, and inspecting annotated types.
    Annotations
    Utility methods for working with instances of Annotation.
    ArrayUtils
    Utility methods for dealing with arrays, including primitive arrays.
    Blaster<T>
    Forwards method calls to multiple instances.
    Blaster.Result<T>
    The result of blasting a method invocation out to a single target object.
    BlasterException.BlasterExceptionCause  
    Caster<T>
    An object that can cast objects to arbitrary interfaces.
    Caster.Builder<T>
    A builder of Casters.
    ClassHierarchyScanner<R,P>
    An object that scans an entire type hierarchy.
    ClassHierarchyScanner.Builder<R,P>
    Builder pattern for constructing ClassHierarchyScanner instances.
    ClassLoaders  
    DispatchSettings
    Settings related to dispatch of interface methods when using a Caster.
    Enums  
    EnumType<T>
    An enumeration of elements.
    EnumType.Builder<T>
    A builder for constructing an EnumType.
    Members
    Reflection utility methods for working with class members: methods and fields.
    MethodCapturer<E>
    A mechanism for capturing Java method calls.
    MethodSignature
    Represents a method signature, composed of a method name and sequence of parameter types.
    PackageScanner
    Scans directories and JARs for classes, indexing them by package.
    PackageScanner.ClassInfo  
    PackageScanner.PathResult
    The results of scanning a single path.
    PackageScanner.ScanResult
    The results of a scan.
    ProxyUtils
    Utility methods for working with proxies and implementing invocation handlers.
    SecureUtils
    Several utility methods for checking security for reflective access.
    TypeAnnotationChecker.Builder
    A builder for creating instances of TypeAnnotationChecker.
    TypeRef<T>
    A type token that represents a generic type.
    Types
    Numerous utility methods for using, constructing, and inspecting generic types.
    TypeVisitor.Builder<R,P>
    A builder of visitors, using functional interfaces as the building blocks.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DispatchSettings.Visibility
    A level of method visibility, for example public, private, etc.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AmbiguousMethodException  
    BlasterException  
    UnknownTypeException
    An exception that may be thrown when an unsupported sub-type of Type is encountered.

Package com.bluegosling.reflect Description

Utilities to aid in runtime type reflection code, including the use of proxies. This includes numerous useful tools for working with annotations and generic types. It also includes a few interesting tools that rely on reflection and proxies, like a dynamic-cast proxy or a broadcasting proxy.
See Also:
com.bluegosling.apt.reflect
